name: Poulus (Bellecour Games)
description:
This game was made in 5 days during the Creative Week of April 2018

Poulus is an action game. You'll fight against an other hen to control the chicken coop !

Team

  • Nicolas Tardivier : Chef de projet, Sound Design
  • Tom Bouery : 2D Artist, FX & Sound Design
  • Hugo Kihl : Game Design, 2D Artist
  • Clément Audras : Lead tech
  • Benjamin Lapujade : Tech
  • Lucas Gauthier : Level Design & 2D Artist
  • Arnaud Chalier : Game & Level Design
  • Rémi Salomon : Game Design
  • Victor Jaffeux : Game Design, UI Design, Producing
